channel.title: Hp messed up?
channel.description:
I always had my cmd made to close so I didn't notice the errors with hp. [code]Read Error: ./cache/Sprites/HITPOINTS_0.PNG java.lang.NullPointerException at java.awt.Toolkit.createImage(Unknown Source) at Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.<init>(Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.java:92) at client.method34(client.java:2026) at client.method146(client.java:14201) at client.method102(client.java:9382) at client.method9(client.java:10575) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:127) at client.run(client.java:93) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code]
How do I fix that? 317 delta. And it's only while running client not compiling.

item.title: Hp messed up?
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

I always had my cmd made to close so I didn’t notice the errors with hp. Read Error: ./cache/Sprites/HITPOINTS_0.PNG java.lang.NullPointerException at java.awt.Toolkit.createImage(Unknown Source) at Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.<init>(Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.java:92) at client.method34(client.java:2026) at client.method146(client.java:14201) at client.method102(client.java:9382) at client.method9(client.java:10575) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:127) at client.run(client.java:93) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

How do I fix that? 317 delta. And it’s only while running client not compiling.
